texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over the Christmas and New Year period, most of TfL public transport is open. However, planned works and service changes will affect public transport and road travel."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
See our Status updates map for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and London Trams services forÂ 28 December.
There are changes and planned works on the following services today.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Normal Friday service on 24-hour and night routes"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/route/507/?direction=outbound\"\u003e507\u003c/a\u003e route - enhanced Saturday service"," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/route/521/?direction=outbound\"\u003e521\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/bus/route/68/?direction=outbound\"\u003eX68\u003c/a\u003e - special service"]}

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"East"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Liverpool Street and Shenfield","Rail replacement buses between Stratford and Shenfield (except Maryland), calling additionally at Newbury Park for the Central line"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"West"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Reduced service between Paddington and Hayes \u0026 Harlington","Trains every 30 mins.","Trains not stopping at Acton Main Line, West Ealing or Hanwell"]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Limited regular bookings for today. Book your journeys for today from Friday 13 December","Dial-a-Ride services are for registered members only"]}

{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Santander Cycles"}
Santander Cycles are available throughout December, including today.
